scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./backend && npm i && npm run start:dev" "cd ./frontend && npm i && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./backend && npm run build" "cd ./frontend && npm run build"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd ./backend && npm run format" "cd ./frontend && npm run format"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd ./backend && npm run lint" "cd ./frontend && npm run lint"

backend/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,css,scs: bash -c 'pushd backend && npm run format && git add . && npm run lint && git add . && popd'
frontend/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,css,sc: bash -c 'pushd frontend && npm run format && git add . && npm run lint && git add . && popd'
